entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
